events.title: Confused Lovers
events.text:
Confused Lovers meet the audience online on Seyretix between June 25 and June 27.

Bernard is a successful executive in electronics. His wife, Jacqueline, is interested in antiques and is engaged in the trade of this business. Bernard met Brigitte at a computer show. A closeness arose between them. If his wife, Jacqueline, leaves for the weekend to visit her parents, the house will be empty. Bernard tells his wife that he is going to Marseille for a job and convinces her to go to her parents.
